author: Staff Reporter
text:
Demanding the release of youth who were arrested on false charges and demanding action against the Inspector of Police for arresting them, members of All India Youth Federation (AIYF) staged demonstration near collectorate here on Monday.

On March 6, clash erupted in Perumal Kovil Medu in Ward 59 over a youth teasing a girl. Annathanapatti arrested few youth of the area in this connection. But residents said that the arrested were mere spectators and the police failed to arrest the accused. They also blamed the police for failing to take necessary steps to prevent the attacks. Hence, they demanded action against the police and release of the arrested youth. They staged demonstration near collectorate without obtaining prior permission from the police. When the police attempted to arrest them, they left the venue.
title: AIYF demands release of arrested youth
